job.title: Software Engineer - Blockchain
job.description:
We are Mythical Games, a Venture-backed next-generation game technology company at the intersection of video games and economics led by industry veterans. Our goal is to lead the industry with the launch of exceptional video game experiences that leverage distributed ledger technology (DLT), while also providing a platform of robust tools that will allow any other game developers to do the same.
We are looking for a talented and driven Blockchain Engineer who will be responsible for designing, building, and maintaining Mythical's game platform offerings. This position is Blockchain focused and a successful candidate will have an interest and understanding of some of the following :
Byte serialization for various specifications
Designing, maintaining, and deploying smart contracts
Focus on security and best practices for contract development
Configuring and deploying nodes in a network
Reliable state management
Developing higher-level APIs on top of blockchain primitives
Interoperability
Staying current with the latest blockchain developments
Primarily elixir async backend systems to handle blockchain
Required Experience:
BS or greater, preferably in a science or engineering discipline
3+ years of professional experience in software development
Deep knowledge of Elixir, Rust, Solidity, C++, or JavaScript
Hands-on engineering experience and expertise in one or more of the following blockchain technologies: Ethereum or EOS
Experience developing for a multi-tenant cloud environment (AWS, GCP, Azure)
Experience with Docker and Kubernetes
Experience designing and developing for large, horizontally scalable, high-transaction volume systems
Self-driven: able to innovate, plan, and execute with autonomy
Our team values diversity and believe that it strengthens our games, products, and communities. We strongly encourage POC, folks with disabilities, those belonging to the LGBTQIA+ communities, and folks across all gender identities to apply.
We offer our team benefits such as (but not limited to) high-quality Vision, Dental, and Health Care, generous Parental Leave, and Unlimited PTO to ensure that they actually take time off without the stress of needing to accrue time.
If you need assistance around accommodations due to a disability, please reach out to accessibility@mythical.games. We'll be with you as soon as possible; our goal is to ensure an accessible and equitable interview process for everyone.
